1.title: Launch Date
1.plot: The Paladins spend one last night on Earth in preparation for the launch of the Atlas. Lance works up the courage to ask Allura an important question.

2.title: Shadows
2.plot: Flashbacks shine a light on Honerva's past with Lotor and Zarkon, revealing the motivation for her recent actions.

3.title: The Prisoner's Dilemma
3.plot: After taking control of a Galra base on a dark planet, the Paladins follow a distress signal from a missing fleet and make an unsettling discovery.

4.title: Battle Scars
4.plot: While floating through the universe searching for signs of a Robeast, the Paladins head toward Olkarion and realize they aren't alone on their journey.

5.title: The Grudge
5.plot: The Paladins make plans to meet with the Atlas, but the reunion is interrupted when the Lions are ambushed by a mysterious adversary.

6.title: Genesis
6.plot: Voltron heads to Oriande to confront Honerva after the team discovers she's using wormholes to harvest massive amounts of Quintessence.

7.title: Day Forty Seven
7.plot: Pilots Kinkade and Rizavi provide a documentary-style look at both the lighthearted and stressful moments of day-to-day life on the Atlas.

8.title: Clear Day
8.plot: The crew heads to the planet Drazan to participate in the festivities of Clear Day, but Allura is plagued by nightmares when she stays behind to rest.

9.title: Knights of Light, Part 1
9.plot: The Paladins must travel deep into Allura's mind, and encounter frightening visions along the way.

10.title: Knights of Light, Part 2
10.plot: As they plumb the depths of Honerva's mind, the Paladins face reality-altering challenges.

11.title: Uncharted Regions
11.plot: As Honerva gets closer to creating a catastrophic rift in reality, the Atlas crew races against time to figure out how to locate and stop her.

12.title: The Zenith
12.plot: Confronted by a dark energy like nothing they've faced before, the Paladins must draw on their everlasting bond - and a few Balmera - to forge ahead.

13.title: The End Is the Beginning
13.plot: Voltron and Honerva come together at the source of all realities in the ultimate battle between good and evil for the survival of the universe.

1.title: The Rise of Voltron
1.plot: Overwhelmed but ready for action, five aspiring space explorers learn they have the power to create Voltron, the most powerful robot in the universe.

2.title: Some Assembly Required
2.plot: Princess Allura puts the Paladins through training when they start to lose their focus. They'll need to cooperate to learn to form Voltron.

3.title: Return of the Gladiator
3.plot: Shiro must draw on painful memories from his past when a massive evil robot threatens the peace in Arus, forcing the lions into action.

4.title: The Fall of the Castle of Lions
4.plot: As one Paladin threatens to leave the team, invaders storm the castle and destroy its power crystal in an attempt to steal Voltron.

5.title: Tears of the Balmera
5.plot: Hunk and Coran try to retrieve a new crystal from the Balmera while the rest of the team work to prevent Sendak from leaving the castle with Voltron.

6.title: Taking Flight
6.plot: The paladins leave Altea and embark for Balmera to fulfill Hunk's promise to Shay. En route, however, a distress signal waylays the crew when they go to investigate the signal's source.

7.title: Return to the Balmera
7.plot: Allura, Coran and the Paladins return to the Balmera to free the natives, but the arrival of a Galra ship could force Voltron into action.

8.title: Rebirth
8.plot: As the Paladins scramble to ward off a Galra monster, Allura hopes that her ancient powers can heal the Balmera and save its people.

9.title: Crystal Venom
9.plot: Allura considers making a heartbreaking sacrifice to save the team when the castle mysteriously turns on them and seems them hurtling toward doom.

10.title: Collection and Extraction
10.plot: The team stops at an isolated and seemingly insignificant Galra space station and discovers how the empire is gathering its energy from the universe.

11.title: The Black Paladin
11.plot: Zarkon lures Voltron into battle on his ship, and when one of the lions is captured the team must get creative to defeat the Galra and return home.

1.title: Across the Universe
1.plot: The lions get separated when a trip through a wormhole goes awry, while Coran and Allura scramble to break free of a seemingly endless time loop.

2.title: The Depths
2.plot: Hunk and Lance crash-land underwater and follow a mermaid to a civilization whose queen promises to keep them safe and help find the others.

3.title: Shiro's Escape
3.plot: After being saved from a dangerous situation by an unexpected ally, Shiro urges the rest of the team to trust his rescuer.

4.title: Greening the Cube
4.plot: While making repairs to the castle, the Paladins encounter unusual spongy spores that lead them to a planet of brilliant engineers.

5.title: Eye of the Storm
5.plot: Exhausted after a battle, the crew must spring back into action when Zarkon's forces track them down. Coran gets infected by a slippery virus.

6.title: The Ark of Taujeer
6.plot: Four of the Paladins head to a ravage planet called Taujeer to help the citizens escape, while Allura and Keith go off on a separate mission.

7.title: Space Mall
7.plot: Shiro attempts to create a deeper bond with the Black Lion, while Coran takes the others to a swap meet, where they have some strange adventures.

8.title: The Blade of Marmora
8.plot: Keith and Shiro travel to a hard-to-find base in an effort to align with the Blade of Marmora. Keith must fight to unlock the truth about his past.

9.title: The Belly of the Weblum
9.plot: The Paladins split up to gather resources for a showdown with Zarkon. Hunk and Keith travel into the belly of a planet-devouring creature.

10.title: Escape from Beta Traz
10.plot: Lance, Pidge and Shiro infiltrate a facility to free a prisoner of the Galra, but Lance and Shiro each think they've found the right inmate.

11.title: Stayin' Alive
11.plot: Allura travels to the Balmera to acquire a powerful crystal, but a visit from an evil beast prompts her to call on the Paladins for help.

12.title: Best Laid Plans
12.plot: After acquiring the teludav from the Olkari, the team prepares to launch the operation to defeat Zarkon and bring peace to the universe.

13.title: Blackout
13.plot: The Paladins fight an epic battle against the most powerful enemy they've ever faced, with the fate of the universe at stake.

1.title: Changing of the Guard
1.plot: As the Paladins work to build a coalition of rebels, Allura makes a suggestion that rattles the team. A new face aims to gain power with the Galra.

2.title: Red Paladin
2.plot: Lotor's forces move to retake the planet Puig and lure the Paladins out for a fight. Keith and Lance struggle to adjust to big changes.

3.title: The Hunted
3.plot: Keith's reckless choice leads the team into a dangerous situation, and Allura needs to channel one of the Paladins to get out of trouble.

4.title: Hole in the Sky
4.plot: The castle receives a distress signal that leads Allura and Coran to believe that they may not be the only surviving Alteans.

5.title: The Journey
5.plot: A pair of skeptical rebel fighters make things difficult for a Paladin in need of assistance. Haggar steps up her monitoring of Lotor.

6.title: Tailing a Comet
6.plot: As the Paladins pursue the comet, they become confused by Lotor's actions. Keith doubts his leadership skills, while Lance ponders his future.

7.title: The Legend Begins
7.plot: As the team tries to decipher Lotor's plan for the comet, Coran gives the Paladins a history lesson about the origins of Voltron and the ongoing war.

1.title: Code of Honor
1.plot: Keiths divided attentions cause tension within the team at a time when unity is crucial. The Blades investigate a Galra supply route.

2.title: Reunion
2.plot: Pidge gets information that prompts her to embark on an important solo mission to the far reaches of the universe.

3.title: Black Site
3.plot: An internal struggle for power erupts within the Galra. Pidge returns to the castle with some precious cargo.

4.title: The Voltron Show!
4.plot: Clean gets carried away with turning the Paladins into intergalactic stars when he designs an elaborate, effects-filled live tour of the universe.

5.title: Begin the Blitz
5.plot: Team Voltron devises a plan to continue the coalition's momentum and take control of more Galra territory. Lotor makes a big move.

6.title: A New Defender
6.plot: Forces of good and evil converge on the planet Naxzela, where Voltron faces unforeseen danger only one Paladin can help them escape.

1.title: The Prisoner
1.plot: After a daring mission at a key Galra outpost, the team considers a risky alliance. One Paladin leads a journey to retrieve an important prisoner.

2.title: Blood Duel
2.plot: Faced with a painful decision, the Paladins reluctantly come to an agreement with Zarkon. Haggar comes to grips with memories from the past.

3.title: Postmortem
3.plot: A power struggle erupts within the Galra. As the Paladins argue over their next move, an attack forces them to save themselves and the Olkari.

4.title: Kral Zera
4.plot: Shiro acts against the wishes of the other Paladins. Powerful Galra from around the empire convene for the Kral Zera ceremony.

5.title: Bloodlines
5.plot: Keith is sent to find a fellow Blade named Krolia and locate a powerful weapon. Lance, Hunk and Pidge reprogram a robot to have fun.

6.title: White Lion
6.plot: The team searches for a portal to a mysterious, fabled Altean land called Oriande. Shiro starts to feel like there's something wrong with him.

1.title: Omega Shield
1.plot: An attack by Sendak prompts the Paladins to scramble to a planet's defense. Lotor calls on Allura for help in assembling a powerful ship.

2.title: Razor's Edge
2.plot: Keith's journey to an abyss to search for a quintessence source unlocks memories about his past. Lance wallows in unrequited love.

3.title: Monsters & Mana
3.plot: When the team takes a break to play a magical role-playing game, their fantasy world sparks useful ideas to help them solve real-world problems.

4.title: The Colony
4.plot: After Lotor and Allura head off in the new ship, the remaining Paladins get a dire warning that could change everything.

5.title: The Black Paladins
5.plot: As one Paladin takes on a dangerous mission through a wormhole, the others contend with failing controls on the castle.

6.title: All Good Things
6.plot: A metaphysical encounter shines light on a Paladin's fate. Lance and Allura console each other about their past judgments. Lotor makes a plea.

7.title: Defender of All Universes
7.plot: An epic battle leaves the universe in a state of chaos, threatening to destroy all life unless a sacrifice is made.

1.title: A Little Adventure
1.plot: Part of the group gets stuck on a planet where they're inadvertently miniaturized. Flashbacks reveal the beginnings of Keith and Shiro's relationship.

2.title: The Road Home
2.plot: The Paladins stop at a base that belongs to the Blades, only to find it's been abandoned. But they come under attack before they can investigate.

3.title: The Way Forward
3.plot: Stuck in a perilous situation far from home and needing help to get free, the Paladins realize their fate is in Coran's hands.

4.title: The Feud!
4.plot: The Paladins inexplicably become contestants on the crazy game show "Garfle Warfle Snick." But they're playing for much more than cash and prizes.

5.title: The Ruins
5.plot: When Pidge intercepts a distress signal that the Paladins believe they recognize, the team ends up on a ruined planet that was ravaged by war.

6.title: The Journey Within
6.plot: As the Paladins hurtle through space, they enter a seemingly endless void that tests their sanity and their loyalty to one another.

7.title: The Last Stand, Part 1
7.plot: The Paladins receive a distress signal that's explained through a flashback to Pidge's father Sam's return to Earth four years earlier.

8.title: The Last Stand, Part 2
8.plot: Sam and the others at the Garrison attempt to hold off the Galra attacks in hopes that a desperate plea for help will reach Voltron.

9.title: Know Your Enemy
9.plot: The Team, realizing Earth have been overtaken by Galra Forces, figures out how to hide their lions and head to earth without them. When there they meet up with old friends and family and start working on a plan to take Sendak down.

10.title: Heart of the Lion
10.plot: The Paladins work with the Garrison pilots on a mission that could provide more clues about how to take down Sendak's operation.

11.title: Trial by Fire
11.plot: Sanda's revelation shakes the Paladins, who are separated from the Lions. On Earth, Shiro, Sam and Coran attempt to get the Atlas powered up.

12.title: Lions' Pride, Part 1
12.plot: When Voltron run into trouble, Shiro goes on a solo mission to defeat Sendak once and for all.

13.title: Lions' Pride, Part 2
13.plot: With the future of Earth hanging in the balance, Voltron and the others come together to face a mysterious enemy unlike any they've ever seen.

imdb.plot outline: After Keith, Lance, Pidge, Hunk, and Shiro are sent into space in a blue lion, they find two "alteans" by the names of Allura and Coran who have been frozen in crypto-pods for ten thousand years. They then discover that they must each pilot one of the robotic lions of Voltron, and defend the universe from an alien species called the "galra", and there evil emperor "Zarkon."
imdb.title: Voltron
plot: Five teenagers become the last line of defense for the galaxy in an intergalactic battle against the evil alien force led by King Zarkon.::Every Official Published VLD Source

After Keith, Lance, Pidge, Hunk, and Shiro are sent into space in a blue lion, they find two "alteans" by the names of Allura and Coran who have been frozen in crypto-pods for ten thousand years. They then discover that they must each pilot one of the robotic lions of _Voltron_ (qv), and defend the universe from an alien species called the "galra", and there evil emperor "Zarkon."
